project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: This project involves creating a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project structure including necessary files
Integrate with the weather public API to fetch weather data
Extract the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data extraction functionalities
Execute tests to ensure the program correctly fetches and displays weather data
